title: Sid.meiers.Railroads.PATCH.1.01.+.nocd.CRACK1.01
description:
Read the readme file and you can play Online with your game!

Package contains Original Patch to v.1.01 and the hide utility Y.A.S.U.

v1.01 is a functionality patch for Sid Meier\&#039;s Railroads! This patch corrects bugs related to AI, interface, functionality, performance, as well as crashing.


IMPORTANT: You can only have deamon tools 4.x installed for this to work. After patched - Have the game mounted, run the YASU exe click ok. run your shortcut or exe in your game folder. When u done playin online so on, run yasu.exe again to unhide or restart.

HAVE FUN PLAYING ONLINE!:-)
